title: Lithium−sulfur pouch cells with 99% capacity retention for 1000 cycles
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02149E, Paper
Huangwei Zhang, Yidan Zhang, Chen Cao, Wanli Zhao, Kai Huang, Yi Zhang, Yue Shen, Zhen Li, Yunhui Huang
Lithium−sulfur (Li−S) battery is a highly promising candidate for the next−generation battery system. However, the shuttle effect of polysulfides or the dendrites and side reactions of lithium metal anodes limit...
